name: Blitz Source Code File
summary: Learn about .BB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Blitz3D is used for creating 3D games. BlitzMax is based on BASIC and can create cross-platform games. BlitzPlus is designed for building simpler 2D games and applications.

description: Source file written in Blitz, a game-programming language; compiled using a Blitz compiler included with BlitzMax, Blitz3D, or BlitzPlus development software.
